summary: This is an email from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team to an unspecified recipient, providing a redacted response to a law enforcement request (External Case No. 20 Cr. 330). The email states Amazon has complied with the request but has redacted certain information and reserves objections due to the voluminous nature of the request.

events.title: Amazon's Response to Law Enforcement Request
events.description: Amazon sends a communication with an attached spreadsheet (CRIM1153768_Response.xlsx) in response to a law enforcement request related to case 20 Cr. 330. The response includes redactions and notes objections due to the request's volume and burden.

keyFacts: Amazon responded to a law enforcement request related to criminal case 20 Cr. 330 on November 10, 2021.
The response included an attached Excel file (CRIM1153768_Response.xlsx) with redacted information, specifically the titles of expressive materials.
Amazon reserved objections to the request, citing that it was unusually voluminous and would cause an undue burden.
The communication originated from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team and was marked as potentially containing privileged or confidential information.
The document reference EFTA00099077 is associated with this Amazon correspondence.
